means: [医]当归属，白芷属：形科植物的一属。欧白芷(A.archangelica)的根和果实含挥发油、白芷酸（以前作为镇静药）和其他几种酸。这种植物具有驱风、发汗和利尿等性质
[女子名] 安杰莉卡 Angel的派生词

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 16th cent.: from medieval Latin (herba) angelica 'angelic (herb'), so named because it was believed to be efficacious against poisoning and disease

entry.tran: 糖渍白芷（可用于做蛋糕或糖果）
entry.def: Angelica is the candied stems of the angelica plant which can be used in making cakes or sweets.

means.word_mean: 1. any of various tall and stout herbs of the genus Angelica having pinnately compound leaves and small white or greenish flowers in compound umbels
2. candied stalks of the angelica plant
3. aromatic stems or leaves or roots of Angelica Archangelica
